column4: in rc2.d change the link forgdm from starting with S to starting with K is all
I see no "gdm"
it will be something like   S99gdm   or similar
I searched for "gdm" using the search tool, and nothing.
which ubuntu are you using?
in terminal do   ls /etc/rc2.d | grep dm
K?
What's that do?
did you find it?
flametai1@flametai1-desktop:~$ ls /etc/rc2.d | grep dm
seems you're not using a *dm then
I have a NVidia card
that shouldn't matter :]
can you paste what   ls /etc/rc2.d   returns?
I already did it returns nothing lawl, also do you know how I would stop the X Server?
that was a diff command then
what does the login window look like? - and does   sudo service gdm stop   kill X?
I got it I think
great! I think... :]
I never got the level thing but I know how to kill X server now
What's the chances of a driver update going wrong?
it can happen but it isn't common for the non proprietry drivers to fail
you could try in terminal   sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade && sudo apt-get dist-upgrade   to see if it pulls in any missing packages
Checked, all is good.
